about.description: Title for the About application screen.

access_190_countries_with_hma_pro_vpn.description: Button label upselling the full-featured desktop VPN client. Variant C.
access_190_countries_with_hma_pro_vpn.message: Acceda a más de 190 países con HMA! Pro VPN

access_190_countries_with_our_vpn.description: Label upselling the full-featured desktop VPN client. Variant A.
access_190_countries_with_our_vpn.message: Acceda a más de 190 países con nuestra VPN.

access_280_locations_with_hma_pro_vpn.description: Button label upselling the full-featured desktop VPN client. Variant B.
access_280_locations_with_hma_pro_vpn.message: Acceda a 280 ubicaciones con HMA! Pro VPN

active.description: Label shown when the auto disguise feature is active on the current tab.

add_website.description: Button label, adds a website to the auto disguise list.

another_browser_extension_is_controlling.description: Label on a screen indicating that some settings are not accessible due to conflicting third party extensions.
another_browser_extension_is_controlling.message: Otra extensión del navegador está controlando su configuración de proxy. Deshabilítela para que HMA! Web Proxy funcione.

auto.description: Label indicating automatically selected (usually fastest) location. Shorter variant.

auto_disguise.description: Feature name - the location is being automatically disguised based on the URL of the site the user is visiting.

auto_disguise_sites.description: Label showing number of configured auto disguise sites. Displayed on its own, should start with capital letter, if not starting with number. Contains ICU message syntax.
auto_disguise_sites.message: { sites, plural, one {1 sitio} other {# sitios} }

auto_location.description: Label indicating automatically selected (usually fastest) location. Longer variant.

automatically_disguise_my_location.message: Camuflar automáticamente mi ubicación en los siguientes sitios web.

automatically_disguise_your_location_on_.message: Camufle automáticamente su ubicación en determinados sitios web

blank_page.description: Label for safe page dropdown item. Triggering the Tab Killer will result in opening a blank (white) tab.

cancel.description: Button label, discards changes in configuration.

choose_new_location.description: Title on a screen with list of available locations.

custom_page.description: Label for safe page dropdown item. Triggering the Tab Killer will result in opening a tab with custom URL.

disable_other_extension.description: Button label, disables conflicting third party extensions.

disguise_as.description: Label introducing the currently selected proxy location. Shown when main proxy switch is off.

disguise_my_ip_address_when_using_browse.message: Camuflar mi dirección IP al usar chats de vídeo y voz en el navegador

disguise_my_location_as.description: Label for dropdown where user selects location that will be active on selected website.

disguised_as.description: Label introducing the currently active proxy location. Shown when main proxy switch is on.

do_even_more_with_hma_pro_vpn.description: Button label upselling the full-featured desktop VPN client. Variant A.
do_even_more_with_hma_pro_vpn.message: Haga aún más con HMA! Pro VPN

feedback.description: Button label, opens website where user can submit application feedback.

get_hma_pro_vpn.description: Button label, opens a website where user can download the full featured VPN client.

get_hma_pro_vpn_for_total_protection.message: Obtenga HMA! Pro VPN para conseguir una protección completa.

go_pro_for_optimized_streaming_locations.message: Obtenga la versión Pro para conseguir ubicaciones de transmisión optimizadas.

go_pro_for_video_streaming_locations.description: Label upselling the full-featured desktop VPN client. Variant B.
go_pro_for_video_streaming_locations.message: Obtenga la versión Pro para conseguir ubicaciones de transmisión de vídeos.

help.description: Button label, opens website with application help.

hey_no_judgements.message: No le juzgamos. Con Tab Killer podrá ocultar de forma instantánea todas las pestañas de su navegador cuando su jefe esté cerca (y volver a mostrarlas cuando se haya ido)

hide_tabs.description: Button label, triggers the Tab Killer feature.

instantly_hide_all_open_browser_tabs.message: Oculte automáticamente todas las pestañas abiertas en el navegador.

keyboard_shortcut_to_toggle_tabs.description: Label for dropdown where user selects shortcut for Tab Killer
keyboard_shortcut_to_toggle_tabs.message: Atajo del teclado para ocultar o mostrar pestañas:

loading_hma.description: Label shown when the application has not yet finished loading.

looking_at_forbidden_sites_instantly_hid.message: ¿Está buscando sitios prohibidos? Oculte de forma instantánea todas las pestañas del navegador cuando su jefe esté cerca.

need_more_locations.description: Label upselling the full-featured desktop VPN client. Variant A.

new_tab_page.description: Label for safe page dropdown item. Triggering the Tab Killer will result in opening a new tab.

next_time.description: Button label, postpones some action for some time.

no_modifier_key.description: Label for a keyboard shortcut modifier key dropdown. The actual meaning is that no modifier key (such as Alt or Ctrl) will be used in the shortcut.

note.description: Label/title for some interesting fact about the product.

off.description: Label describing that something is turned off.

on.description: Label describing that something is turned on.

on_auto_disguise_sites.description: Label indicating the auto disguise feature is on and showing number of configured auto disguise sites. Contains ICU message syntax.
on_auto_disguise_sites.message: En ({ sites, plural, one {1 sitio} other {# sitios} })

on_press_shortcut.description: Label indicating the Tab Killer feature is on and suggesting user to press a keyboard shortcut to trigger the Tab Killer feature. {shortcut} placeholder stands for the actual keyboard shortcut, e.g. ALT + K.

open_tab_thats_safe_for_work.description: Label for dropdown where user selects what kind of a tab will open when tabs are hidden.
open_tab_thats_safe_for_work.message: Abra una pestaña que sea segura en el trabajo:

our_keyboard_shortcut_only_works_when_yo.message: Nuestro atajo de teclado solo funciona cuando se encuentra en una página http o https. Si está en una pestaña nueva o en una página en blanco, tendrá que abrir nuestra extensión y hacer clic en el botón de Tab Killer para ocultar o mostrar pestañas.

press_shortcut.description: Label suggesting user to press a keyboard shortcut to trigger the Tab Killer feature. {shortcut} placeholder stands for the actual keyboard shortcut, e.g. ALT + K.

privacy_policy.description: Button label, opens website with the privacy policy for the product.

product_description.description: Product description which is used for this application.
product_description.message: Camufle su ubicación para desbloquear sitios web y acceder de forma anónima a sus noticias, redes sociales y programas de televisión gratuitos desde cualquier lugar.

product_name.description: Product name which is used for this application.
product_name.message: HMA! VPN Proxy: desbloquee sitios web y manténgase a salvo

product_name_short.description: Short product name which is used for this application.

product_name_short_chrome.description: Short product name which is used for this application.

product_name_short_firefox.description: Short product name which is used for this application.

rate_us.description: Button label, opens website where user can rate the application.

reopen_tabs.description: Button label, reopen tabs previously closed by Tab Killer feature.

save.description: Button label, persists changes in configuration.

some_settings_are_disabled_because_of_an.description: Label indicating that some settings are not accessible due to conflicting third party extensions.
some_settings_are_disabled_because_of_an.message: Algunas opciones se han deshabilitado a causa de otra extensión.

stream_videos_with_hma_pro_vpn.description: Button label upselling the full-featured desktop VPN client. Variant D.
stream_videos_with_hma_pro_vpn.message: Vea vídeos con HMA! Pro VPN

stream_yourself_into_a_coma.description: Label upselling the full-featured desktop VPN client. Variant B.

tab_killer.description: Feature name - can hide (close) all browser tabs using a keyboard shortcut.

tabs_hidden.description: Label showing number of tabs hidden by Tab Killer feature. Contains ICU message syntax.
tabs_hidden.message: { hidden, plural, one {1 oculta} other {# ocultas} }

terms_and_conditions.description: Button label, opens website with the terms and conditions for the product.

this_browser_aint_big_enough.description: Title on a screen indicating that some settings are not accessible due to conflicting third party extensions.
this_browser_aint_big_enough.message: ¡Este navegador no es lo suficientemente grande para los dos!

too_lazy_to_click_the_on_button.message: ¿Le da demasiada pereza hacer clic en el botón de activación? Le entendemos. Con la opción de camuflaje automático podrá ocultar su ubicación de forma automática siempre que visite determinados sitios web.

turn_off.description: Button label on the main proxy switch. Turns the proxy off.

turn_on.description: Button label on the main proxy switch. Turns the proxy on.

unblock_even_more_content.description: Toast notification title. Refers to unblocking online content blocked in the country of the user.

version.description: Label with application version, {version} placeholder stands for the actual version number, e.g. 1.0.345.

what_are_you_waiting_for.message: ¿A qué espera? Haga clic en mi bonita cara para camuflar su ubicación.

when_i_visit_this_website.description: Label for input where user enters website address.

your_location_is_auto_disguised.description: Title shown to user when the auto disguise feature is active on the current tab.
your_location_is_auto_disguised.message: Su ubicación se ha camuflado de forma automática.

your_location_is_disguised.description: Title shown to user when the main proxy switch is on.

your_location_is_exposed.description: Title shown to user when the main proxy switch is off.
